original_title: Forbidden Affairs 12: My Best Friend's Dad
overview: Nicole has Daddy issues and its not a secret. After a failed relationship with a married man she goes to stay with her friend, CC for the summer in the hopes of forgetting her broken heart. But, when Nicole discovers that CCs Dad is exactly her type - shes left wondering whether her friendship or her heart is more important to her. Little does she know - shes about to find herself in a whole lot of trouble.
tagline: A Girl Wants What She Wants
title: Forbidden Affairs 12: My Best Friend's Dad
